mean_en: to be used instead of something/somebody else; to do something instead of somebody/something else; to remove somebody/something and put another person or thing in their place
sentence: Gradually, robots have replaced factory workers.
sentence_trans: 机器人逐渐代替了工厂的工人。
word_etyma: re重新 + place放，地方 → 重新放 → replace代替
